name: Secret House | 秘密房间 | 秘密の部屋
name_original: Secret House | 秘密房间 | 秘密の部屋
description:
This is a concise horror Room escape game
Every time in a while, there will be terrible monsters here
You need to collect random items in the game and fight with them
And make sure your life is safe and escape

There is a main room in the game
A corridor
3big secret rooms
1 small chamber
1 escape room

4 kinds of monsters
As the time goes by, monsters will become more and more powerful

Including more than 30 props waiting for your discovery
There are some random elements in the game with certain replay
At the same time, there are many hidden elements in the game that can help you escape

Thank you for your support
